attributes.review: The app so very dry and it was just a waste of my storage. Disgusting. Trust me, there is no good reason to download this app. Your going to end up deleting it anyways. Worst app in the App Store if I do say so myself 😌💅
attributes.title: Useless

attributes.review: I first downloaded the app to look at the news about the handsome president trump ✨ 🧚🏻‍♀️ but I just got spammed a bunch of ads and was soon glitched off the app. 1/10
attributes.title: Glitch and spam

attributes.review: The orange man made a terrible app... too glitchy and I saw his Cheeto face way too much like dude I’m just tryna vibe 😔🖐🏽 anyways I do not recommend and apple should definitely remove this asap!!! #DUMPTRUMP2020
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I tried ordering my dog food but It kept asking for my email and started getting spam messages about some orange guy I see on tv all the time.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: doesn’t work properly. makes my phone glitch. ✨anyone but trump 2020✨ my b i thought i was supposed to give my opinion.
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: The app crashes a lot and it’s annoying
attributes.title: Crashing problem

attributes.review: This app promotes hate, racism, misogyny, xenophobia, and fascism. Really the worst app I’ve ever had the displeasure of downloading to my phone. If I could give less than one star I’d give it -10,000. Anyways ✨Biden 2020✨
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I was looking for an  intellectual app to add to my phone , but after I saw this app . It’s the most unintelligent that AppStore has ! It looks like this president wants us dead!
attributes.title: Black lives matter

attributes.review: I died and came back to life by a witch but even she wouldn’t be able to do it if I looked at the app for one more one second
attributes.title: I died from this

attributes.review: Don’t download. We already have bugs in the White House, don’t download if you want bugs on your phone too :)
attributes.title: Just plain old garbage 🤮
